subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Steve Williams, who caddied for four notable golfers in his career and was inducted into the Caddie Hall of Fame last week, said he was ready to spend more time with his family in New Zealand.
snippet: Steve Williams, who caddied for four notable golfers in his career and was inducted into the Caddie Hall of Fame last week, said he was ready to spend more time with his family in New Zealand.
